title: Pixel 1 doesn't boot into recovery mode
content: Actually I was on call and phone suddenly switched off. I tried to boot it up but it boot into 1/2 screen like broken. Then I tried to boot into fastboot mode it booted up fine but there BL & BA is showing N/A so I tried to boot into recovery he shows logo and turned off then again I tried 2-5 times the same thing happened then I again I tried to shows fail to boot into recovery mode I don't know why and my bootloader is lock 🔐 now I don't know what to do please help me out if any one knows the solution 🙏🙏please.
